text: Can we specify which template we want to use for Google AMP or does it automatically default to HubSpot's own template for now?
<@U2T1S81EX> right now there is just one default template for AMP conversion

Anyone done any work with using sub topics or categories for blog posts? Looking to filter posts by type (new, event, etc) and actual topic (topic 1, 2, etc) - also trying to retain them on one blog instead of using multiple blogs to add the extra filter
<@U3SHN6Z3K>: you'd have to set parameters within your blog loop to the custom field your going for and then use the topics as subs from there
